creditline: Gift of James Cahn and Jeramiah Collatz
description: close-up black and white photograph of ornate entrance gate to a shrine; roof tiles along top capped with crests of three leaves; ornately carved lintel with leaves, birds above band of hexagonal crests with flowers; two shaped grates framed with paintings of peonies above another band of hexagons, and another bar of ornate carving
title: How to Create a Beautiful Picture 7: Nikko Toshogu
